Text: Thanks GIANNIS511! you know, i'll have to wait a couple hours until i have time to read it, but i could have sworn that the last issue's storyline still wasn't over ...

When I extract the files they have no image and are listed as 0x0 pixels. All images are there and they take up memory. None of your other torrents did this, only this one. Can you or anyone help me figure this out?

I don't know how to edit... so I'll just leave another message. I use WinRar to open the files because I didn't know how to open .cbz/.cbr files and when I googled it it said to just rename the file and open it with a decompression program.

This method has worked for all your[talking to the uploader] previous torrents and on others as well, but I can't get it to work for this one... So again, please, if anyone has any helpful clues so I can read this book, let me know!
